data.expected_result: There should be an error, or a toast, saying somewhere along the lines of "This field is required", or "you must input a valid invite", etc.
data.short_description: "Join" button on Join a server screen does absolutely nothing when nothing is inputted.
data.steps_to_repro: - Scroll all the way down to the + button. - Click on it, and select "Join a server". - When you reach that screen, don't input anything, and just press "Join".
